a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Effective fertility rate: children per woman who are expected to
A comparison between two measures of the fertility rate: the total fertility rate considers all births per woman, while the
effective reproductive fertility rate considers those expected to survive to reproductive age (15â€“49 years old).
Data source: Malani and Jacob (2024) and other sources
